attributes.action: Prevent Birmingham & the West Midlands being used as a testing ground for road pricing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As road pricing is discussed more and more, Birmingham & the West Midlands is constantly "promoted" as the inevitable choice for it's introduction. However, this has been without proper debate or consultation with the people. These tolls will only serve to make living costs higher for the citizens of this area while at the same time nothing is done to improve the inadequate and over crowded public transport system.
